description: This React component named SuccessScreen displays a confirmation message with user profile details, such as username and avatar preview, after successful profile creation. It utilizes Card and Button components for layout and interaction.

methods.name: SuccessScreen({ username, avatarPreview, onReset })
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a success message with optional username and avatar preview, including a button to reset or create a new profile.

ctags.name: SuccessScreen
ctags.pattern: /^export default function SuccessScreen({ username, avatarPreview, onReset }) {$/
